options.optionText: Alright, impress me. Play something that *doesn’t* sound like a dying Brahmin.
options.responseText: Challenge accepted. But fair warning: your standards might actually rise by the end of this.

auto_lines: Try not to cry, or worse, sing along.
Try not to cry, or worse, sing along.
Alright, hold on to your last brain cell—this might be the thing that finally knocks it loose.

options.optionText: So, when are you releasing your mixtape?
options.responseText: Oh, it’s dropping soon. Exclusively in vault bathrooms for that *perfect* acoustics experience.

followUpOptions.optionText: Bathroom mixtape? That’s peak vault energy. I’d listen.
followUpOptions.responseText: Good, because I expect rave reviews. Or, you know, just flushing sounds. Same thing.

options.responseText: Leaving already? You’re going to miss my grand finale. Or not. I haven’t decided yet.
